A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I lost interest and and was disappointed from the moment Luke tossed his lightsaber over his shoulder... It was like: screw this and screw you... and I felt: okej\, screw this movie. And it was all down hill from there. I was detached. The story didn't glue on me\, and the current political awareness permeated every action made me feel like it wasn't a Star Wars saga I was experiencing. Zero stars
